_description: A couplet translating ‘Qui me deridet non inde risus abibit’

BodRawD328.Transcription: He þat mokytschall noȝt be owyn mokyt
BodRawD328.Note: English portion all written on one line.
BodRawD328.Editions:
Meech,  Sanford Brown. 
             “A Collection of Proverbs in Rawlinson MS D 328.” 
             Modern Philology
         38 (1940-41): 113-32: 125.
